Name: Crownless?
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project The Second Coming of Solaris...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project The Second Coming of Solaris...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this chapter, the true identity of the protagonist's nemesis is finally revealed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the book, it's "...a towering figure with rough edges like a statue..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "An aura of brilliant stars surrounded this Crownless King like loyal courtiers..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "It nearly compelled me to bow down... I gathered all my strength from falling on my knees..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where did you learn that name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Second Coming of Solaris has received overwhelming favor for this part. Fans of this book call this mighty figure The Crownless.

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe I have read this book after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? We must have made a wise decision to pick you as our exclusive consultant.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you know the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We want something to help the dev team to picture the image of the Crownless.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How peculiar... I'll hand it over to the dev team right now. Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe the team would have a much more vivid picture of the protagonist's first encounter with the Crownless.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you know the name? Many take "Big Brother" as a nickname for the Crownless.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, let's call it a day. See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A ferocious opponent... The Crownless... Maybe you should ask someone who frequents the danger zone?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xianchen over there is an experienced Pioneer explorer. If you need help, how about asking her?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've read Second Coming of Solaris. A good piece of work, I'd admit... But I've never finished it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because it makes me sweat bullets when reading the portrayal of the monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those monsters in the book... They must be the Tacet Discords.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do they really look that scary?
I fight Tacet Discords a lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, they do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* I ventured into Tacet Fields a lot when I was young, wishing to get some first-hand reports about Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But my adventure was cut short by an accident, where I was heavily injured by Tacet Discords. After that, I decided to leave the field and work for the support staff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is something I brought from the Tacet Field back in those days. Just take a look at this ominous structure. It's too weird to be a natural formation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're after something related to monsters, just take this.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you really okay with that?
I can feel it's important to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't take it to your heart. Life is much better when you don't have to handle those Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it does remind me of those young Pioneer reporters. They can risk everything for a field trip about Tacet Discords. I can't help but worry about them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, no. Let's continue this topic next time. I'm off to talk to Zhuyi about his dangerous field trip...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've read Second Coming of Solaris. A good piece of work, I'd admit... But I've never finished it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because it makes me sweat bullets when reading the portrayal of the monsters.
